text: [Music]
the secret of the Little Mermaid once
upon a time in the most beautiful castle
by the sea was Princess Aria and Prince
Edward in the evening they walked along
on the pier of the castle and watched
the sunset and in the morning they swam
in the sea to enjoy the Sun none of the
other humans in the kingdom knew that
Princess aria was actually a mermaid
except the prince of course my princess
eventually everyone will figure out that
you're a mermaid why do you wish to keep
it a secret not all people are as kind
as you my prince if they realized that
I'm a mermaid whenever mermaid Aria
thought about telling her secret she
would remember her father's words
daughter you must realize that human
beings are harmful one day Aria and her
friend the maid of the castle were
walking along the coast daddy come on
run and bring it my boy daddy loves you
so much my princess he is a very loyal
very kind dog Lily my princess I want to
ask you something if you allow me hmm of
course you may ask the servants in the
castle my friends the people everyone
thinks you're a mermaid is that true
the mermaid was shocked by the things
she heard she immediately remembered the
free and beautiful memories that she had
in the oceans
[Music]
[Applause]
[Music]
[Applause]
um no it's not true
hi I'm a human just like you I just love
swimming and watching the sea creatures
sorry my princess everyone was asking so
I was wondering - no problem Lily if
you'll excuse me I must go back to the
castle and continue my work come on boy
come on after Lily left the Little
Mermaid Aria went to the pier with her
dog dagi I feel very bad because I can't
tell the truth even to my friend dagi
dagi barked several times pointing at
the ocean dagi are you trying to say
that maybe it would be good to see my
underwater friends right while Lily was
working in the castle hall she came out
on the castles balcony for some fresh
air and she saw Aria down at the pier
just as Aria stood to jump into the sea
Lily saw arias human legs turn into a
mermaid tail she was astounded Lily ran
excitedly and left the castle she
couldn't believe what she'd seen she
started to tell her closest friends what
she saw meanwhile mermaid Aria went to
the deep sea Kingdom and visited her
father Poseidon her sisters and her best
friend the tiny dolphin dolphin
who always listened to arias questions
Dolphy I'm afraid to tell people that
I'm a mermaid
well why are you afraid are you because
humans may not be as understanding as my
kind Edward yes but you've always been
good to people are you so they won't
want to hurt you you're a mermaid and so
lucky don't you think they'll understand
you're right Dolphy of course they will
be as aria was talking to her tiny
friend Dolphy Lily's friends back on
land did not believe Lily and thought
she was lying I'm not lying approved you
the princess aria is a mermaid when it
was evening on the coast
Lily secretly went to the pier with a
glass box and waited for the mermaid
Aria to return lily was hurt that her
friends had laughed at her and that the
princess Aria had denied being a mermaid
after a while she noticed a ripple on
the water and dragged the glass box to
the end of the pier and dropped it into
the water the little mermaid Aria was
underwater unaware of Lily's glass box
which was coming down from the pier
almost invisibly in the water she was
about to get out of the water and turn
into a human but she crashed into the
glass box in the water before she
realized what was happening the lid of
the box closed on her help what's
happening
[Music]
when Lily felt the tug on her rope she
pulled the glass box from the sea and
left it on the pier
Aria became hopeful for a moment when
she saw Lily Lily Lily save me
sorry Aria you are a mermaid and you
lied to me now I have to prove to my
friends that I'm not a liar huh Lily
dragged the glass box to an abandoned
spot on the coast
Aria tried and tried to get out of the
box but it was locked tightly and she
could not escape she couldn't call her
friends on the land nor in the sea
morning finally came and Lily woke up
early to wait for her friends to come
she quickly covered the glass box with a
cloth and little mermaid Aria was not
able to do anything she couldn't see
outside the tarp and she was so very
afraid Lily's friends finally arrived at
the beach here is the proof that I'm not
a liar look at our princess Aria all
this time she hid from us that she was a
mermaid Lily's friends were wide eyed
and so shocked that they couldn't even
blink they examined Aria closely to see
if it was the princess they were amazed
but as it happened the wicked sea witch
Vega was watching from the ocean and
decided that she could use this
situation to her advantage hmm it looks
like Aria needs help yes it looks like
this is a perfect opportunity Vega took
her octopus arms out of the water and
stretched them towards the beach she
grasped the glass box which Aria was in
Lily and her friends couldn't believe
what they saw and of course they were so
scared
Aria pounded on the glass but could not
escape Vega dragged the little mermaid
Aria into the ocean and the maids stood
and did nothing
No oh no an octopus woman has kidnapped
the princess of our country
Vega opened the lid of the glass box
she had kidnapped and released the
mermaid Aria Vega
you saved me thank you so much for your
kindness
yes little mermaid I saved you and in
return you will give me the key to the
treasure of the deep-sea Kingdom what no
yes listen I'm grateful that you rescued
me but I cannot surrender the key to the
treasure of the deep-sea kingdom friends
should be kind without requiring a
reward angry at these words Vega wanted
to imprison the mermaid back in the
glass box then she started throwing ink
balls from her octopus arms however the
little mermaid used her magical sea
powers to block the ink balls and stick
vega's dangerous arms into the sand
under the water
[Music]
I will find you Aria you owe me a favor
favors are done without expecting
anything in return Vega if you want to
be a good person you need to learn to be
a kind friend when Aria returned to land
she remembered how awful Lily had
treated her and Aria was deeply sad she
immediately went to Prince Edward to
tell him everything that had happened
then they summoned Lily Lily I'm sorry
for not telling the truth yes I'm a
mermaid my home is both the land and the
sea and I love ocean creatures and land
people too I was cruel to you my
princess I'm so sorry
the next day aria finally revealed to
everyone that she was a mermaid all the
people living in the country and even
the animals were very very happy with
this news because now they had a
beautiful princess who could protect
them both on land and at sea
[Music]
